Page.title: setting hexoBlog
Page._content:
1. hexo setting  

nodejs 
ref) https://nodejs.org/ko/download/

git 
ref) https://git-scm.com/
(   default ,  cmd  .)

2. github settings

  repository 2 .
( ,  github )
github    dasso-co-kr.github.io
 . (dasso-co-kr   )

github   clone .

(    ,     .)

  clone   .git    , 
 .

---

cf)   
1   .
2  git init :     .
3  git config (--global) user.name ""
    git config (--global) user.email " "
//     .
4  git remote add origin remoteRepo ("   .)
5  git push -u origin master :    -u      .

6 git add . (.       )
7 git commit -m "  "
8 git push origin master :  .

---

cmd npm  hexo . 

npm i -g hexo-cli

npm i

theme     book theme .

ref) https://github.com/kaiiiz/hexo-theme-book

         .

( 
    cmd theme      npm i  ,
    theme         .
    ex) cd themes/transquilpeak && npm run build
)

 _config.yml     .

'# Site
title: Dasso Blog
subtitle: 
description: 
keywords:
author: Dasso
language: en
timezone:

url: https://dasso-co-kr.github.io
( github page )

deploy:
  type: git
  repo: https://github.com/dasso-co-kr/dasso-co-kr.github.io
( github  )

'# Search Generator 
search:
    path: search.xml
    field: post
(     .)

---

cf) hexo  

 hexo   reference  hexo    . 
ref) https://hexo.io/ko/docs/

cmd     

(      ,     .)

hexo init  hexo  init .


hexo new page(post/draft) title
(     index.md  .)

hexo generate
(   .)

hexo server
(  .)

hexo deploy -g
(github   , -g  Deploy   generate .)

---
